price: Gandi Nuti ishee balleessine tokkolleen isaaniin duratti hin amanne; sila isaan ni amanuu?
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
